sentences.sContent: The obligation of cohabitation of spouses is the basis of marital rights.
sentences.sContent_eng: The obligation of cohabitation of spouses is the basis of marital rights.
sentences.sCn: 夫妻间的同居义务是夫妻其他权利与义务的基础。

sentences.sContent: Or maybe it's about spending more time together if you're not at the cohabitation stage yet.
sentences.sContent_eng: Or maybe it's about spending more time together if you're not at the cohabitation stage yet.
sentences.sCn: 或者如果你们还没有到同居的阶段，或许只是花时间在一起的问题。

sentences.sContent: More second marriages fail than first marriages. With the increasing acceptance of cohabitation, why remarry? Why risk that nightmare all over again?
sentences.sContent_eng: More second marriages fail than first marriages. With the increasing acceptance of cohabitation, why remarry? Why risk that nightmare all over again?
sentences.sCn: 更多的第二次婚姻比第一次更差。伴随更多同居被接受，为什么要再婚？为什么要再冒险那个噩梦？

remMethod.val: 来自cohabit(vi. 同居， 同住)

words.tran: 同居（尤指未婚而同居者）
